Pingo Doce

Coisas de miúdos.

Film and radio campaigns

Reading takes us further.

A child’s imagination has no limits. To show that, and to sell a collection of juvenile books, we invited Fernanda Serrano to interview a group of interviewees with a very fertile imagination.

Bando do Bosque

Bando do Bosque is a bunch of plush friends that anyone who shops at Pingo Doce can take home. They also have an adventure book. And are adorable. We invited them to go to the radio and tell the children about this brand new collection.

BBDO C: Andreia Luísa C.D: Marco Pacheco
